South Africa

The Garden Route

South Africa, The Garden Route

Join us on an unforgettable group tour to South Africa's breathtaking The Garden Route in October. This exciting adventure promises to be a captivating blend of natural wonders, cultural experiences, and thrilling activities. From stunning landscapes to diverse wildlife, there's something for everyone to enjoy. Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere, indulge in local delicacies and scenic vineyards, and create lasting memories with fellow travelers. Get ready to embark on an extraordinary journey that will leave you inspired and awestruck.

18–25 October 2023 8 days / 7 nights
Price from: $$$$$$ / per person
Please note that the availability and pricing of these additional services may vary. Kindly reach out to our team for further details and personalized assistance based on your specific requirements.

    View image Gallery >
    Plettenberg Bay, South Africa

Tour highlights:

  • Wildlife Encounters

    Experience the incredible biodiversity of South Africa through exhilarating wildlife encounters. Embark on thrilling safari expeditions and have the opportunity to spot the famous Big Five – lions, elephants, buffalos, leopards, and rhinoceroses.

  • Scenic Landscapes

    Explore the picturesque Garden Route region, known for its lush greenery, rolling hills, and stunning vineyards. Marvel at the breathtaking beauty of the surroundings and capture unforgettable moments amidst nature's wonders.

  • Gastronomic Delights

    Indulge in the delectable flavors of South African cuisine. Sample an array of local dishes, including braai (barbecue), biltong (dried cured meat), and bobotie (spiced minced meat baked with an egg-based topping). Explore the region's renowned wineries and savor exquisite wines produced in the fertile vineyards.

  • Adventure Activities

    Get your adrenaline pumping with a range of adventure activities. From hiking through scenic trails to adrenaline-fueled wildlife safaris, there's no shortage of thrilling experiences for the adventurous souls.

  • Cultural Immersion

    Immerse yourself in the vibrant local culture and traditions. Engage with friendly locals, visit traditional villages, and witness traditional dances and music performances. Gain insight into the rich heritage and history of the region.

  • Group Dynamics

    Forge new friendships and create lasting bonds with fellow travelers. Share unforgettable moments, laughter, and experiences with like-minded individuals who share your passion for exploration and adventure.

  • Meeting Point: Cape Town Airport
  • Tour Ends at: Plettenberg Bay Airport
  • Visa Requirement: US citizens can stay visa-free for up to 90 days. Please check visa requirements for other nationalities.
  • Personalized Service: After submitting your application, your dedicated Clavis manager will contact you, providing an agreement, document checklist, travel information, and addressing any queries.
  • Accommodation in 5* hotels (double rooms, single with surcharge)
  • Daily breakfasts at hotels
  • 2 wine tastings
  • Transfers as per itinerary
  • Airport transfers
  • Visit to the beach with penguins
  • Sunset cruise in Knysna
  • Elephant walk experience
  • Support and translation throughout the tour
